name: SacrificeToLive
description:
Your task in this game is to sacrifice to this monster. If you don't, it will be terrible.

Your goal is to survive 3 stages of the Monster!

Do you think that you can just sacrifice an innocent victim? If so, then sorry.

All animals sacrificed will be resurrected in the graves nearby and will take revenge.

Control:

- WASD or ARROW keys - Move

- Space - Dash

- E  - Picking up an animal and Sacrificing to a monster

- Q  - Ejection of the sacrifice from the hands
